name: The Chained Key
description:
What happens when you mix "Prince of Persia", "Cut the Rope" and "Mario Maker"?

The Chained Key has all the qualities of these games.
It is a platform game, where to solve the level you must find a way to break the chain to release the key and open the door.

The game environment is 2.5D and has real-time physics.
The user can create their levels with a very simple and intuitive editor and can share their level with anyone, generating a code of the level.
